articles.description: Devdutt Padikkal's innings was a masterclass of aggressive and controlled batting. Hammering a spectacular 193 runs, his knock was adorned with 24 boundaries
articles.content: On the second day of the 2024 Ranji Trophy against Punjab, Devdutt Padikkal showcased a performance that can only be described as both stunning and record-breaking. Scoring his third First-Class cent… [+3278 chars]
